statements: SELECT * FROM InvestmentMetrics;
SELECT investment_id, sharpe_ratio, beta FROM InvestmentMetrics;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentMetrics WHERE sharpe_ratio > 1.5;
SELECT investment_id, standard_deviation FROM InvestmentMetrics ORDER BY standard_deviation DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT beta FROM InvestmentMetrics;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentMetrics ORDER BY sharpe_ratio DESC, standard_deviation ASC
SELECT investment_id, beta FROM InvestmentMetrics WHERE sharpe_ratio > 1.5 ORDER BY beta
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_investments, AVG(sharpe_ratio) AS avg_sharpe_ratio FROM InvestmentMetrics WHERE standard_deviation < 0.05
SELECT * FROM InvestmentMetrics WHERE beta BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0
SELECT MAX(sharpe_ratio) AS max_sharpe_ratio, MIN(beta) AS min_beta FROM InvestmentMetrics
SELECT * FROM InvestmentMetrics;
SELECT investment_id, sharpe_ratio FROM InvestmentMetrics;
SELECT investment_id, beta FROM InvestmentMetrics ORDER BY beta DESC;
SELECT return_id, return_value, return_date FROM InvestmentReturns WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT investment_id, standard_deviation FROM InvestmentMetrics WHERE standard_deviation > 2.5;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentMetrics WHERE sharpe_ratio > 1.5 ORDER BY sharpe_ratio DESC;
SELECT standard_deviation, beta FROM InvestmentMetrics WHERE beta < 1.0 AND standard_deviation > 0.5;
SELECT investment_id, COUNT(*) as return_count FROM InvestmentReturns GROUP BY investment_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT * FROM InvestmentReturns WHERE return_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY return_value DESC;

SELECT IM.investment_id, IM.sharpe_ratio, IR.return_value FROM InvestmentMetrics IM INNER JOIN InvestmentReturns IR ON IM.investment_id = IR.investment_id WHERE IM.beta < 1.2 ORDER BY IR.return_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics WHERE sharpe_ratio > 1.5
SELECT id, beta, std_dev FROM risk_metrics WHERE beta < 0
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM investor_details ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT * FROM investment_performance WHERE volatility BETWEEN 0.05 AND 0.1
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics JOIN investment_performance ON risk_metrics.id = investment_performance.investment_id
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM investor_details WHERE investor_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM risk_metrics ORDER BY sharpe_ratio DESC;
SELECT investment_id, returns, volatility FROM investment_performance WHERE returns > 0.05 AND volatility < 0.1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM investor_details WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com';

SELECT risk_metrics.id, risk_metrics.beta, investment_performance.returns, investor_details.first_name FROM risk_metrics JOIN investment_performance ON risk_metrics.id = investment_performance.investment_id JOIN investor_details ON risk_metrics.id = investor_details.investor_id;
SELECT * FROM SharpeRatio WHERE sharpe_ratio > 1.5;
SELECT company_name, beta FROM Beta WHERE beta < 0;
SELECT investment_type, std_dev FROM StandardDeviation ORDER BY std_dev DESC;
SELECT evaluation_date, performance_score FROM PerformanceEvaluation WHERE risk_metric_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM SharpeRatio WHERE risk_metric_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM SharpeRatio ORDER BY sharpe_ratio DESC
SELECT company_name, beta FROM Beta WHERE beta > 1 ORDER BY beta
SELECT investment_type, std_dev FROM StandardDeviation WHERE std_dev BETWEEN 1 AND 2 ORDER BY std_dev
SELECT * FROM PerformanceEvaluation WHERE evaluation_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY performance_score ASC
SELECT * FROM SharpeRatio INNER JOIN PerformanceEvaluation ON SharpeRatio.risk_metric_id = PerformanceEvaluation.risk_metric_id
SELECT * FROM Portfolio;
SELECT name, capital FROM Portfolio WHERE capital > 10000;
SELECT symbol, price, quantity FROM Stock ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT date_added, market_price FROM MarketData WHERE date_recorded = '2022-01-01';
SELECT beta, std_dev FROM RiskMetrics WHERE sharpe_ratio > 1.5;
SELECT * FROM Portfolio WHERE capital > 100000 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT p.name, s.symbol, m.market_price FROM Portfolio p JOIN Stock s ON p.id = s.id JOIN MarketData m ON s.id = m.stock_id WHERE m.date_recorded > '2022-01-01';
SELECT pm.stock_id, pm.return_rate, pm.variance, rm.sharpe_ratio FROM PerformanceMetrics pm LEFT JOIN RiskMetrics rm ON pm.stock_id = rm.stock_id WHERE rm.beta < 1;
SELECT * FROM Stock WHERE quantity > 100 AND date_added < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT p.name AS portfolio_name, COUNT(s.id) AS num_stocks FROM Portfolio p JOIN Stock s ON p.id = s.id GROUP BY p.name;
